owl:Class.rdfs:label: Story
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A story that may be told, contain other stories, and have a sequence of events.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: subject
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The subject(s) of the story. e.g. characters, events, skos concepts.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: sub_story
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A story which is contained within this story. For example, a TV episode may contain stories for different characters, or one overarching story may contain several other smaller stories.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An ordered list of Events within this story.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interpretation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An interpretation of something in the context of a story, given some supporting material. This is the viewpoint of the interpretation's creator, and may assert statements about the item.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: interprets
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The thing which is interpreted by this interpretation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: asserts
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The Assertion which is asserted by this interpretation.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EventList
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Provides a means to create an ordered list of events that occur within a story - effectively a pairing of an Event and a numeric position.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EventSlot
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Places an Event in an EventList, with index and neighbouring Event information.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Assertion
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Contains a set of statements in the form of an RDF graph, thus allowing for interpretations to assert beliefs about the state of the system.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: facts
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Facts asserted by this assertion, in the form of an RDF graph.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: supports
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Thing which supports an Interpretation (e.g. a supporting document, Event, etc).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: tells
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A story told by this Thing. The Thing could be a photograph which has a story attached to it, a person, a country, a monument, etc.
